name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>証<rt>あかし</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: If your opponent has a face-up monster on their field, equip this card to 1 face-up Celestial Warrior, Warrior, or Fairy Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [its Level] x 100.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
